body:
When a board or BBS is moderated, then the moderator takes responsibility. 
bbspink is to big to moderate. It is impossible to see all the posts that are posted daily. 
So it is Unmoderated, not moderated. 
If someone posts a deletion request, then it becomes necessary to check into it. 
Example: Mr. Smith decides to search through a bbs and become its moderator. 
He finds many things that are objectionable to him. Since Mr. Smith is a deletion volunteer 
he is actively looking for things to delete. This makes him a moderator. It is an act of taking 
responsibility. 
Here is another example of things that happen sometimes. 
Mr. Brown does not like Mr. Smith, so Mr. Brown reports Mr. Smith posts as objectionable. 
Then he requests that they be deleted. This silences Mr. Smith if they are deleted. 
The only thing wrong with Mr. Smith posts was that Mr. Brown did not like Mr. Smith. 
We have to use our thinking caps to make sure we don't delete this type of material Only reported posts should be deleted, and the deleter should be able to understand the reason for the deletion. If he does not, then the post should not be deleted.
